name: Hammer Hamster
description:
(Global Game Jam 2020 Submission)

Place unusual objects in the map to fix the flaws and reach the checkpoints.

After fixing the map, you can press start and set the hamster free.

Gathering sunflower seeds is a plus.

Instructions:

- Left Click on the objects to place them on the map

- Right Click to dismiss a selected object

- Press START to release the tiny hound

- Gather the most Sunflower Seeds possible
